camel.kamelet.nats-source.servers.name: camel.kamelet.nats-source.servers
camel.kamelet.nats-source.servers.description: Comma separated list of NATS Servers

camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamEnabl.name: camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamEnabled
camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamEnabl.description: Sets whether to enable JetStream support for this endpoint.

camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamName.name: camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamName
camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamName.description: Sets the name of the JetStream stream to use.

camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamAsync.name: camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamAsync
camel.kamelet.nats-source.jetstreamAsync.description: Sets whether to operate JetStream requests asynchronously.
